name: EGamePhase
comment:
@todounlock  As I see this is not necessary, and it's not particularly modder friendly,
             This could be replaced by an index into the array, then we don't need to do reverse look ups and stuff. -G2, 6 mars 19

name: FPhaseTierInfo
comment: Used for specifying what tiers are included in what game phase.

properties.name: GamePhase
properties.comment: The phase to specify tier for

properties.name: LastTierOfPhase
properties.comment: What is the last tier of the phase specified previously.

properties.name: PhaseUnlockedMessage
properties.comment: Message sent when this phase is unlocked

name: FPhaseCost
comment: This is used to specify the cost for the different phases of the game.

properties.name: GamePhase
properties.comment: The phase to specify the cost for

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the game phase manager, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the game phase manager from a world context, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: SetGamePhase
methods.comment: Updates the game phase number. Must be called from authority to take effect.

methods.name: GetBaseCostForGamePhase
methods.comment: Returns the cost for the passed game phase

methods.name: GetCostForGamePhase
methods.comment: Returns the cost for the passed game phase

methods.name: PayOffOnGamePhase
methods.comment: Pays off on a game phase

methods.name: ResetGamePhase
methods.comment: Resets the game phases to the defaults. Used for resetting progression for testing.

properties.name: mGamePhaseTierInfo
properties.comment: Specifies what game phases are connected to what tiers

properties.name: mGamePhaseCosts
properties.comment: Speciefies what the different tiers cost

properties.name: mOnGamePhaseChanged
properties.comment: Called when the game phase is updated
